Html:
This is most probably normal so it's not an 'issue' but a discussion topic. I noticed that Arcane optimization is about 2 to 4 times slower than it was. It's either a 'slider being more thorough' change or the software itself is heavier, I guess most probably the second.

I use 'Simple Stacking' and unticked haste level optimization (used in fire) as suggested.
It most likely has to do with the trinkets you have, simple stacking is slower the more on use effects you have enabled.
